sentence: This isn’t the first time Ducey’s name has come up as a potential GOP candidate against Democratic U.S. Sen. Mark Kelly.
author: Jeremy Duda
title: Ducey: I’m still not running for Senate

sentence: The poll also showed that more voters said they were likely to choose incumbent Democrat Mark Kelly over the GOP candidate, whoever it is, 42%-38%.
author: MARCIA HAMMOND
title: Poll gives noncandidate Ducey the lead in Arizona GOP Senate race

sentence: Doug Ducey of Arizona could reshuffle the Arizona Senate race if he changes course and decides to give it a go, according to a new survey of registered voters that pegged him as the best bet to oust Democratic Sen. Mark Kelly in the 2022 midterm elections.
author: Seth McLaughlin
title: Gov. Doug Ducey is GOP’s best bet in Arizona Senate race despite opposition from Trump: Poll

sentence: Doug Ducey has notified Senate Republican leader Mitch McConnell that he will not enter his state’s high-profile Senate contest, a disappointing development for establishment Republicans who saw Ducey as their best hope to defeat Democratic Sen. Mark Kelly this fall.
author: STEVE PEOPLES
title: No Senate run for Arizona Gov. Ducey, blow to GOP recruiting

sentence: Doug Ducey has notified Senate Republican leader Mitch McConnell that he will not enter his state's high-profile Senate contest, a disappointing development for establishment Republicans who saw Ducey as their best hope to defeat Democratic Sen. Mark Kelly this fall.
title: No Senate Run for Arizona Gov. Ducey, Blow to GOP Recruiting

sentence: The Arizona Republican primary to challenge Sen. Mark Kelly, D-Ariz., is shaping up to be a close one between a pair of America First candidates surging in two polls released Monday.
author: Eric Mack
title: Two Polls Show Close Race Between Masters, Lamon

sentence: Brnovich is among several Republican candidates who are vying to unseat Democratic Senator Mark Kelly.
author: Katya Schwenk
title: Trump Bashes Brnovich, Will Endorse Other Senate Candidate

sentence: The winner of the Republican primaries will face off against incumbent Democrat Sen. Mark Kelly on Nov. 8.
author: Alex Caldwell
title: Trump will not endorse Arizona Attorney General Mark Brnovich for U.S. Senate
